title: Auto-open Zellij layout on worktree creation
description:
When a new worktree is created, automatically open a Zellij layout with:

**Layout structure:**
- **Left pane**: Text editor opening the worktree root folder
- **Bottom-left (stacked)**: Terminal running init commands from config
- **Right pane**: Claude Code instance (pre-opened)

**Configuration (toml file):**
```toml
[hooks]
# One-time hook: runs only once after fresh install (e.g., first worktree clone)
install = "bun install"

# Start hook: runs every time worktree is opened
start = "bun run serve"
```

**Hook types:**
1. **install hook** - Runs once per worktree (e.g., `bun install`, `npm ci`)
2. **start hook** - Runs every time layout opens (e.g., `bun run serve`, `npm run dev`)

Detect if install hook already ran (marker file or check node_modules exists).

title: Add worktree management commands (like worktrunk)
description:
Implement worktree management similar to worktrunk.dev with 4 core commands:

1. **maestro switch** - Switch to a worktree or create new one with `-c` flag
2. **maestro list** - List all worktrees with their status
3. **maestro remove** - Remove worktree and delete associated branch
4. **maestro merge** - Squash/rebase/merge changes back to main and cleanup

Reference: https://worktrunk.dev/worktrunk/

description:

title: Claude hook: detect waiting state when displaying user choices
description:
When Claude Code displays choices for the user to select (e.g., AskUserQuestion tool), the instance status should be set to 'waiting' but currently remains as 'running'.

The Claude hook should detect this state and call 'maestro update waiting' so the plugin UI shows the correct status icon (üí¨).

This likely requires parsing Claude's output to detect when a choice prompt is displayed.

title: Show git diff before wt merge
description:
Before performing a worktree merge, show the user a diff of what changes will be merged. This gives the user visibility into what's being merged and a chance to abort if needed.

Could be implemented as:
- Show diff summary (files changed, insertions, deletions)
- Optionally show full diff with --verbose flag
- Add confirmation prompt before proceeding

title: Add GitHub Actions CI for release builds
description:
Create GitHub Actions workflow to build and release the CLI and Zellij plugin:

- Build CLI binary for Linux (x86_64, aarch64)
- Build WASM plugin for Zellij
- Create GitHub releases with artifacts
- Run tests before release
- Trigger on tags (v*)

title: Rename Zellij tab to worktree name on layout open
description:
When auto-opening the Zellij layout for a worktree, rename the tab to the worktree/branch name for easy identification.

Part of the auto-open layout process - use `zellij action rename-tab <worktree-name>`

title: Zellij keybinding config parameters don't take effect
description:
The Zellij keybinding configuration in README.md doesn't work as documented. The plugin-specific parameters (width, height, pinned, x, y) don't take effect when using LaunchPlugin in keybinds.

Current documented config:
```kdl
bind "Alt m" {
    LaunchPlugin "file:~/.config/zellij/plugins/maestro.wasm" {
        floating true
        pinned true
        width "20%"
        height "20%"
        x "80%"
        y "80%"
    }
}
```

Need to investigate:
1. Whether these parameters are supported in LaunchPlugin keybindings
2. If not, what the correct syntax is for positioning/sizing floating plugins
3. Update README with working configuration
